div.p: As Dr Beloli did not meet me at Cairo I kept on to this place and am sleeping at CW Holman. I cannot get home before the 25 of this month as Genl Orme has given me the position of Cotton agent at Yazoo City Miss - with pay of $6 per day 10 cent per mile for traveling fees and 24 percent of the value of all cotton collected so that at last I have a fair chance of getting us a HOME for our old age I have S. Athearn with me and will go down and start him and go home to fix you for the winter. before the 10th of next month if you can find a little house

for rent I will be home in time to move you if you remain let Dietrich know - you had better send the children to school The not meeting Dr Belote seems Providential as had we gone thro the Country I should have been too late as Genl Orme is hurrying off agents as fast as he can and cannot let me run up home at once as I asked him but says I can go before October, I know you will be disappointed at my movement and took a day to consider and came to the conclusion that I had better go - I do no expect to be down more than three months and expect then to be able to remain with my darling the rest of my life with Gods blessing I will suceed in my endevours to make some money hurry

the Holmans are well Holman drinks very hard which I regret as I cannot do anything for a drunkard I any my lady seeing about getting ready for my trip. hoping to see - you by the 25 I not I trust you will all be well Direct to WR Hackley Treasury agent Yazoo City Miss - I will write again from Vicksburg if I can Kiss the children for me The school Books are in the boxes 1 and 2 at the right of the door as you go to the front room the screw driver is in the small book box with hinges in the front room
